text: The 1943 Ashford by-election happened on 10 February 1943. The by-election happened because the current MP, Patrick Spens was made Chief Justice of India. Conservative candidate Edward Percy Smith won the election. Percy Smith won with 69.7% of the vote. == References == Category:1943 in Europe Category:History of Kent Category:Elections in the United Kingdom Category:1940s in the United Kingdom
title: 1943 Ashford by-election
